    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">From 14 April 2024 to 31 March 2025, you can enjoy a basic bonus unit rebate of up to HKD3,000 when you make TVC contributions with HSBC MPF or transfer TVC accrued benefits from other MPF schemes to HSBC MPF<sup><a href="#fn-mpf-tvc-accrued-benefits" data-back-link-connected=""><span aria-hidden="true">1</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Footnote link 1</span></a></sup>. The more you contribute or transfer to us, the more bonus unit rebate you will enjoy.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you are an employee of the MPFA Good MPF Employers on the day of opening your HSBC MPF TVC account, you can enjoy extra 1.5 times of bonus unit rebate as our selected customer<sup><a href="#fn-mpf-mpfa-good-employer" data-back-link-connected=""><span aria-hidden="true">2</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Footnote link 2</span></a></sup>, equivalent of a bonus unit rebate of up to HKD4,500.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Investment involves risks. T&Cs apply.</p>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"></p><p>You can enrol in a TVC account if you fall under any of the following categories:</p>
<div class="commonMark-list">

<p>Please note that you can only have one TVC account under an MPF scheme.</p>
<p></p>

        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1438535904__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1438535904__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What is the processing time for enrolling in an HSBC MPF tax-deductible voluntary contribution account? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1438535904__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_11">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_7" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">It will depend on how you submit your application to us.</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>By paper form: within 5 business days</li> 
 <li>By tablet through an MPF specialist at a designated HSBC branch: within 2 business days</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Learn more about <a href="/mpf/processing-time/" data-pid="PWS_HK_EN_C99940_6" data-tms-element-tracked="true">our processing time for account enrolment</a>.</p>
</div></div>

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1920478516__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1920478516__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How long will it take to change my investment mandate for existing account balance or future contributions? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1920478516__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_12">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_19" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_8" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can submit your instructions to rebalance or switch funds online, via the mobile app or the Interactive Voice Response System (IRVS).</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you submit them before 4:00pm on a working day, we'll process them within the same day. Otherwise, we'll process them on the next business day.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">See <a href="/mpf/processing-time/" data-pid="PWS_HK_EN_C99940_7" data-tms-element-tracked="true">how to submit instructions and their processing time</a>.</p>
</div></div>

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1790948970__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1790948970__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Can I make tax deduction arrangements for my voluntary contributions'? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1790948970__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_13">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_20" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_9" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">With effect from 1 April 2019 onwards, you may enjoy tax relief for the contributions you make to your tax-deductible voluntary contribution (TVC) account. Since the tax assessment year 2019/2020, the maximum tax relief limit is HKD60,000 per tax year. This limit is shared between your TVCs and premiums paid to selected qualifying annuity products. Any tax deduction claims will be applied to TVCs first, before other qualifying annuity premiums.</p>
</div></div>

    <h3 aria-label="Important notes" class="A-TYP28L-RW-ALL">Important notes</h3>
    <div class="genericModalBody parsys">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text"><div data-zone="Hongkong" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" id="genericModalBody_richtext_1">
    <ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>The HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund - SuperTrust Plus is a mandatory provident fund scheme.<br> </li> 
 <li>You should consider your own risk tolerance level and financial circumstances before making any investment choices or investing in the MPF Default Investment Strategy (the DIS). You should note that the DIS Constituent Funds, namely, the Core Accumulation Fund and the Age 65 Plus Fund, the DIS or a certain Constituent Fund may not be suitable for you. There may be a risk mismatch between the DIS Constituent Funds or a certain Constituent Fund and your risk profile (the resulting portfolio risk may be greater than your risk preference). When you are in doubt as to whether the DIS or a certain Constituent Fund is suitable for you (including whether it is consistent with your investment objectives), you should seek financial and/or professional advice. You should make the investment decision most suitable for you taking into account your circumstances.</li> 
 <li>You should note that the implementation of the DIS may have an impact on your MPF investments and accrued benefits. We recommend that you consult with the Trustee if you have doubts on how you are being affected.</li> 
 <li>The Guaranteed Fund invests solely in an approved pooled investment fund (APIF) in the form of an insurance policy provided by HSBC Life (International) Limited. The guarantee is also given by HSBC Life (International) Limited. Your investments in the Guaranteed Fund, if any, are therefore subject to the credit risks of HSBC Life (International) Limited. Please refer to section 4 Risks of the <a rel="noopener" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure.pdf"><span aria-hidden="true">MPF Scheme Brochure</span><span class="visuallyhidden">MPF Scheme Brochure This link will open in a new window This link will open in a new window</span></a> for details of the credit risk.</li> 
 <li>The guarantee in the Guaranteed Fund only applies under certain conditions. Please refer to subsection 3.4.3(f) Guarantee features of the <a rel="noopener" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure.pdf"><span aria-hidden="true">MPF Scheme Brochure</span><span class="visuallyhidden">MPF Scheme Brochure This link will open in a new window This link will open in a new window</span></a> for details of the guarantee features (including in the context of payment of accrued benefits in instalments) and the Guarantee Conditions.<br> </li> 
 <li>MPF Benefits, AVC Benefits and TVC Benefits are payable on a Members 65th birthday or on early retirement on or after reaching age 60. The accrued benefits can be paid in one lump sum or in instalments, at the Members election.  The accrued benefits can be paid in such form and on such terms and conditions as the Trustee may, to the extent not prohibited by the MPF Ordinance or General Regulation, prescribe. Please refer to subsection 6.7(c) Payment of MPF Benefits, AVC Benefits and TVC Benefits of the <a rel="noopener" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure.pdf"><span aria-hidden="true">MPF Scheme Brochure</span><span class="visuallyhidden">MPF Scheme Brochure This link will open in a new window This link will open in a new window</span></a> for details.</li> 
 <li>You should not invest based on the information shown on this website alone and should read the <a rel="noopener" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure.pdf"><span aria-hidden="true">MPF Scheme Brochure</span><span class="visuallyhidden">MPF Scheme Brochure This link will open in a new window This link will open in a new window</span></a>. <br> </li> 
 <li>Investment involves risks. Past performance is not indicative of future performance. The value of financial instruments, in particular stocks and shares, and any income from such financial instruments, may go down as well as up. For further details including the product features and risks involved, please refer to the <a rel="noopener" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure.pdf"><span aria-hidden="true">MPF Scheme Brochure</span><span class="visuallyhidden">MPF Scheme Brochure This link will open in a new window This link will open in a new window</span></a>. <br> </li> 
 <li>Important  if you are in doubt about the meaning or effect of the contents of the <a rel="noopener" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure.pdf"><span aria-hidden="true">MPF Scheme Brochure</span><span class="visuallyhidden">MPF Scheme Brochure This link will open in a new window This link will open in a new window</span></a>, you should seek independent professional advice.</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>
